item.title: Enumerating Android installed applications without special permissions
Quick and dirty tcpdump credential (username/password) sniffer
item.description: I’ve been playing the last months with mobile pentesting within the Android platform. As I’ve been able to setup tcpdump-arm on my android phone, I began fooling around with it. I was trying to cross-compile Dug Song’s dsniff into armle architechture but it was only giving me headaches within the libnet/libnids dependencies and stuff.
